response.text:
Based on the search results, several papers discuss the efficacy of Cisplatin and Fluorouracil (CF) compared to Cisplatin and Gemcitabine (GC) in treating nasopharyngeal carcinoma. One relevant paper is:

**Gemcitabine plus cisplatin versus fluorouracil plus cisplatin in recurrent or metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma: a multicentre, randomised, open-label, phase 3 trial** by Zhang et al. (2016)

SAHuang
